com.martinleopold.ledmatrix
Class LEDMatrix

java.lang.Object
  com.martinleopold.ledmatrix.LEDMatrix

public class LEDMatrix
extends Object

Control a LED Matrix driven by PixelPi or similar via UDP.

Field Detail

VERSION

public static final String VERSION
See Also:
Constant Field Values

LANDSCAPE

public static final int LANDSCAPE
Preset for a landscape 18 x 16 LED Matrix with a LED strip layed out in a snake-like pattern. Applies rotate180() and snakeX() which cannot be removed by clearTransformations(). Use with LEDMatrix(processing.core.PApplet, java.lang.String, int, int).

See Also:
Constant Field Values

PORTRAIT

public static final int PORTRAIT
Preset for a portrait 16 x 18 LED Matrix with a LED strip layed out in a snake-like pattern. Applies rotate90() and snakeX() which cannot be removed by #clearTransformations(). Use with {@link #LEDMatrix(processing.core.PApplet, java.lang.String, int, int)}.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

LEDMatrix

public LEDMatrix(PApplet p,
                 String host,
                 int port,
                 int preset)
A LED Matrix configured from a preset.

Parameters:
p - the parent PApplet
host - network IP or host name to send data
port - destination port (UDP)
preset - Choose from either LANDSCAPE or PORTRAIT

LEDMatrix

public LEDMatrix(PApplet p,
                 int width,
                 int height,
                 String host,
                 int port)
A LED Matrix.

Parameters:
p - the parent PApplet
width - width of the LED Matrix in pixels
height - height of the LED Matrix in pixels
host - network IP or host name to send data
port - destination port (UDP)

update

public void update()
Update the LED display. Sends the frame via UDP.

Flip the x axis of LED Matrix.

Don't flip the x axix.

flipY

public void flipY()
Flip the y axis of the LED Matrix.

noFlipY

public void noFlipY()
Don't flip the y axis.

toggleFlipY

public void toggleFlipY()
Toggle flipping the y axis.

rotate180

public void rotate180()
Rotate the LED Matrix by 180 degrees. This is equal to flipX() combined with flipY().

noRotate180

public void noRotate180()
Don't rotate.

toggleRotate180

public void toggleRotate180()
Toggle rotating.

rotate90

public void rotate90()
Rotate the LED Matrix by 90 degrees.

noRotate90

public void noRotate90()
Don't rotate.

toggleRotate90

public void toggleRotate90()
Toggle rotating.

snakeX

public void snakeX()
Transform the output in a snake-like pattern along the x-axis.

noSnakeX

public void noSnakeX()

toggleSnakeX

public void toggleSnakeX()

snakeY

public void snakeY()
Transform the output in a snake-like pattern along the y-axis;

noSnakeY

public void noSnakeY()

toggleSnakeY

public void toggleSnakeY()

testPattern

public void testPattern()
Enable the test pattern. This completely overwrites the frame data each time update() is called. The Pattern consists of a fading color going from red to black, then green to black, then blue to black, written line by line from left to right, top to bottom.

noTestPattern

public void noTestPattern()
Disable the test pattern.

toggleTestPattern

public void toggleTestPattern()
Toggle the test pattern on and off.
